summary: BuildRequest had no explicit requirements, but the stated goal/title is to delete “Bacon Ops Arena” and avoid adding new game features. The diff does not show deletion of Bacon Ops Arena; instead it modifies many Bacon Ops game files and introduces/expands unrelated streaming/channel/admin/profile/Bacon Cash functionality across backend and frontend.

hallucinated_features.description: Streaming/channel platform functionality (channels with categories, stream/ingest URLs, stream keys; browse/category/stream detail/creator studio/admin routes) added/expanded.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest explicitly has no requirements and the title focuses on deleting Bacon Ops Arena, with a non-goal to avoid new game features.

hallucinated_features.description: Bacon Cash economy and admin request management added/expanded (balances/requests, buy/admin pages).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; unrelated to deleting Bacon Ops Arena.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management (name/balance/bestScore) and authorization gating added/expanded.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to deleting Bacon Ops Arena.

hallucinated_features.description: Adult content consent/route guard and expanded category system (10 categories including Adult, Radio, DJs, IRL, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to deleting Bacon Ops Arena.

hallucinated_features.description: Bacon Ops game code appears modified/retained rather than deleted (engine/input/UI files, plus BaconOpsArenaPage still present).
hallucinated_features.reason: Conflicts with the project title/intent “Delete Bacon Ops Arena”; diff shows edits to Bacon Ops rather than removal.
